name: Site Scout
tag_list: adtech, rtb, dsp, adserver, ad-server, advertising, platform, real-time-bidding
overview:
From our humble beginnings in the southeastern Caribbean sea, SiteScout has quickly become one of North America’s fastest-growing startups. In less than 2 years, we have gone from 2 employees on a sailboat, to 20 employees (and growing) in the company’s offices in downtown Toronto, working to revolutionize the way digital media is bought and sold.

Profitable since day 1, SiteScout is now North America’s leading self-serve demand-side platform (DSP) and ad server. With 100+ servers spread across data centers in the US and Europe, our platform processes billions of impressions every single day.

A technology company at heart, we continue to develop our online display advertising platform to accommodate the needs of the internet’s largest publishers, and to manage immense amounts of data.

We differentiate ourselves from competitors by offering unparalleled customer service and management to our thousands of customers. We love what we do, and we are committed to delivering reliable, powerful solutions for the online advertising market. If you are a strategic investor and want to learn more about SiteScout’s business, please contact us.
